code_General.handlers.websocket¶

Generic Backend

Silvio Weging 2023

Contains: Websocket for various stuff

Attributes¶

logger

Classes¶

GeneralWebSocket

Variant of AsyncWebsocketConsumer that automatically JSON-encodes and decodes

Module Contents¶

code_General.handlers.websocket.logger¶
class code_General.handlers.websocket.GeneralWebSocket(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: channels.generic.websocket.AsyncJsonWebsocketConsumer

Variant of AsyncWebsocketConsumer that automatically JSON-encodes and decodes messages as they come in and go out. Expects everything to be text; will error on binary data.

getSession()¶
setSession(key, value)¶
async connect()¶
async disconnect(code)¶

Called when a WebSocket connection is closed.

async receive(text_data=None, bytes_data=None)¶

Called with a decoded WebSocket frame.

async send(text_data=None, bytes_data=None, close=False)¶

Sends a reply back down the WebSocket

async sendMessage(event)¶
async sendMessageJSON(event)¶

KISS-backend
